Html:
All the map can display in your mobile demo,but GoogleMap include GoogleChinaMap.But i use the other maps can display,like YahooMap.

I need use GoogleChinaMap in my project.Can u help me?

to be able to use internet connection in emulator you have to 'cradle' it at connection manager

radioman wrote:

to be able to use internet connection in emulator you have to 'cradle' it at connection manager

radioman, i have 'cradled' at connection manager.and also i can use internet connection in emulator.

and use ur demo,i can display all the map except GoogleMap. so strange...

radioman wrote:

i'll check it later

After checked,tell me,plz...or reply..ok?.thanks a lot.~ ~lol

radioman wrote:

i'll check it later

radioman,i have solve this problem.the reason why i can't display the googlemap is i changed "etc/host" file.in China,sometimes we can't visit google in ipv4.

So i change google ip to visit in ipv6.That's why the emulator cant display the only googlemap.
